description: This layer shows the spatial distribution of WIO GCRMN monitoring sites. The attribute table shows the first and most recent monitoring period/year. The recent year attribute is used to categorise the locations. Contact Mishal Gudka mgudka@cordioea.net for more information about this resource.
keywords: GCRMN, Africa, East Africa, Western Indian Ocean, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mozambique, Reunion, Seychelles, Somalia, South Africa, Tanzania
name: WIO GCRMN Benthic Monitoring Sites (April 2020)
